name: Freezer ID
description: Freezer ID is a sleek website which allows users to itemise the meals they have in their freezer to help them keep track of what is in the freezer. I currently use the website daily as we like to cook our meals and often have leftovers we freeze.

name: Recipe Website
description: Recipe Website is a simple recipe repository which brings together recipes from a variety of sources. The website allows users to find and view recipes, which includes ingredient lists and instructions, they can also sign up and keep track of their favourite recipes!
